title.narrative: Early Warning System and Natural Risk Management

Sistema de Alerta Temprana y Gestión de Riesgo Natural

description.narrative: Reduce the vulnerability of zones affected by current and potential volcanic activity of the Cotopaxi and Tungurahua. This will be achieved through the implementation of an early warning system and the modernization of the institutional framework for risk management under the premise that prevention is a development issue that needs to be considered since the planning stage
